MyMinesweeper.Core

Class Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyMinesweeper.Core.Grid

  • public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a grid of Minesweeper
    Author:
    Lucie

        private int nb_mines
        Number of mines hidden in grid

      • observer

        private MyMinesweeper.GUI.GamePanel observer
        Link to the panel that displays the game on User Interface. The Grid object will call some of the GamePanel update functions when necessary.

        public MyMinesweeper.GUI.GamePanel getObserver()

      • setObserver

        public void setObserver(MyMinesweeper.GUI.GamePanel observer)

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Initialize grid with the correct dimension (rows, columns) and the right number of mines. Mines are allocated randomly to the squares in the grid.

      • openSquare

        public boolean openSquare(int x,
                          int y)
        Manage the opening of the squares with implementation of cascade opening for isolated squares with no mines around. This function won't open a square with a flag.
        Parameters:
        x - : square row
        y - : square column
        Returns:
        false if the square is a non flagged mine that will explode true in other cases

      • flagSquare

        public void flagSquare(int x,
                       int y)
        Manage the action of adding or removing the flag on a square, and updating mines counter
        Parameters:
        x - : square row
        y - : square column
